languages.text: "Как пожелаете". {n}Сухие пальцы быстро стучат по инфопластине. Вскорости префект поднимает глаза от экрана и бесцветным голосом сообщает:{/n} "Леди Моллес-Секандас сознается в подкупе функционера Администратума и умоляет не трогать ее отпрысков".

"As you wish." {n}The prefect's dry fingers tap quickly on her data-slate. Soon afterward, she looks up from the vid-screen and says in a colourless voice,{/n} "Lady Molles-Secundas has confessed to bribing an Administratum official and is pleading for her offspring to be spared."
languages.original_text: "Как пожелаете". {n}Сухие пальцы быстро стучат по инфопластине. Вскорости префект поднимает глаза от экрана и бесцветным голосом сообщает:{/n} "Леди Моллес-Секандас сознается в подкупе функционера Администратума и умоляет не трогать ее отпрысков".

traits.locale_text: "As you wish." {n}The prefect's dry fingers tap quickly on her data-slate. Soon afterwards, she looks up from the screen and says in a colourless voice:{/n} "Lady Molles-Secundas has confessed to bribing an Administratum official and is pleading for her offspring to be spared."

"As you wish." {n}The prefect's dry fingers tap quickly on her data-slate. Soon afterwards, she looks up from the screen and says in a colourless voice:{/n} "Lady Molles-Secundas has confessed to bribing an Administratum official and is pleading for her offspring to be spared."

"As you wish." {n}The prefect's dry fingers tap quickly on her data-slate. Soon afterward, she looks up from the screen and says in a colourless voice:{/n} "Lady Molles-Secundas has confessed to bribing an Administratum official and is pleading for her offspring to be spared."

"As you wish." {n}The prefect's dry fingers tap quickly on her data-slate. Soon afterward, she looks up from the screen and says in a colourless voice:{/n} "Lady Molles-Secundas has confessed to bribing an Administratum official and is pleading for her offspring to be spared."

"As you wish." {n}The prefect's dry fingers tap quickly on her data-slate. Soon afterward, she looks up from the vid-screen and says in a colourless voice,{/n} "Lady Molles-Secundas has confessed to bribing an Administratum official and is pleading for her offspring to be spared."

"As you wish." {n}The prefect's dry fingers tap quickly on her data-slate. Soon afterward, she looks up from the vid-screen and says in a colourless voice,{/n} "Lady Molles-Secundas has confessed to bribing an Administratum official and is pleading for her offspring to be spared."

languages.text: "Wie Ihr wünscht." {n}Die trockenen Finger der Präfektin fliegen über ihren Datablock. Kurz darauf blickt sie von ihrem Vid-Bildschirm auf und erklärt mit farbloser Stimme:{/n} "Lady Molles-Secundas hat gestanden, einen Beamten des Administratums bestochen zu haben und bittet um Verschonung ihrer Kinder."
languages.original_text: "As you wish." {n}The prefect's dry fingers tap quickly on her data-slate. Soon afterward, she looks up from the vid-screen and says in a colourless voice,{/n} "Lady Molles-Secundas has confessed to bribing an Administratum official and is pleading for her offspring to be spared."

traits.locale_text: "Wie Ihr wünscht." {n}Die trockenen Finger der Präfektin fliegen über ihren Datablock. Kurz darauf blickt sie von ihrem Vid-Bildschirm auf und erklärt mit farbloser Stimme:{/n} "Lady Molles-Secundas hat gestanden, einen Beamten des Administratums bestochen zu haben und bittet um Verschonung ihrer Kinder."

languages.text: « Comme vous voudrez. » {n}La préfète se met à tapoter rapidement sa plaque de données de ses doigts décharnés. Quelques instants plus tard, elle lève les yeux de son écran et reprend d'une voix blanche :{/n} « Dame Molles-Secundas a avoué avoir soudoyé un agent de l'Administratum et vous implore de bien vouloir épargner sa descendance. »
languages.original_text: "As you wish." {n}The prefect's dry fingers tap quickly on her data-slate. Soon afterward, she looks up from the vid-screen and says in a colourless voice,{/n} "Lady Molles-Secundas has confessed to bribing an Administratum official and is pleading for her offspring to be spared."

traits.locale_text: « Comme vous voudrez. » {n}La préfète se met à tapoter rapidement sa plaque de données de ses doigts décharnés. Quelques instants plus tard, elle lève les yeux de son écran et reprend d'une voix blanche :{/n} « Dame Molles-Secundas a avoué avoir soudoyé un agent de l'Administratum et vous implore de bien vouloir épargner sa descendance. »

languages.text: “如您所愿。”{n}行政官干枯的手指迅速敲击了一下数据板。过了一会儿，她抬起头，以毫无感情的声音开了口。{/n}“莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人承认贿赂了内政部的某位官员，恳求您能宽恕她的后代。”
languages.original_text: "As you wish." {n}The prefect's dry fingers tap quickly on her data-slate. Soon afterward, she looks up from the vid-screen and says in a colourless voice,{/n} "Lady Molles-Secundas has confessed to bribing an Administratum official and is pleading for her offspring to be spared."

traits.locale_text: “如您所愿。”{n}行政官干枯的手指迅速敲击了一下数据板。过了一会儿，她抬起头，以毫无感情的声音开了口。{/n}“莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人承认贿赂了内政部的某位官员，恳求您能宽恕她的后代。”

languages.text: «Como desee». {n}Los dedos secos de la prefecta se mueven rápidamente por su tablilla de datos. Poco después, levanta la mirada de la videopantalla y dice con voz indiferente:{/n} «Lady Molles-Secundas ha confesado haber sobornado a un oficial del Administratum y suplica que se permita vivir a su descendencia».
languages.original_text: "As you wish." {n}The prefect's dry fingers tap quickly on her data-slate. Soon afterward, she looks up from the vid-screen and says in a colourless voice,{/n} "Lady Molles-Secundas has confessed to bribing an Administratum official and is pleading for her offspring to be spared."

traits.locale_text: «Como desee». {n}Los dedos secos de la prefecta se mueven rápidamente por su tablilla de datos. Poco después, levanta la mirada de la videopantalla y dice con voz indiferente:{/n} «Lady Molles-Secundas ha confesado haber sobornado a un oficial del Administratum y suplica que se permita vivir a su descendencia».

languages.text: 「お望みのままに」{n}総監の乾いた指が素早くデータスレートを叩いた。まもなく彼女はビデオスクリーンから目を上げ、無感動な声で告げた。{/n}「レディ・モレス・セクンダスは帝国行政局の役人への贈賄を自供し、子供たちの処罰を免れるよう嘆願しています」
languages.original_text: "As you wish." {n}The prefect's dry fingers tap quickly on her data-slate. Soon afterward, she looks up from the vid-screen and says in a colourless voice,{/n} "Lady Molles-Secundas has confessed to bribing an Administratum official and is pleading for her offspring to be spared."

traits.locale_text: 「お望みのままに」{n}総監の乾いた指が素早くデータスレートを叩いた。まもなく彼女はビデオスクリーンから目を上げ、無感動な声で告げた。{/n}「レディ・モレス・セクンダスは帝国行政局の役人への贈賄を自供し、子供たちの処罰を免れるよう嘆願しています」

languages.text: "Başüstüne." {n}Prefekt, cılız parmaklarıyla databelasına hızlı dokunuşlar yapıyor. Çok geçmeden başını video ekranından kaldırıp soluk bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Leydi Molles-Secundas; bir Administratum yetkilisine rüşvet verdiğini itiraf etmiş, evlatlarının bağışlanmasını istemiştir."
languages.original_text: "As you wish." {n}The prefect's dry fingers tap quickly on her data-slate. Soon afterward, she looks up from the vid-screen and says in a colourless voice,{/n} "Lady Molles-Secundas has confessed to bribing an Administratum official and is pleading for her offspring to be spared."

traits.locale_text: "Başüstüne." {n}Prefekt, cılız parmaklarıyla databelasına hızlı dokunuşlar yapıyor. Çok geçmeden başını video ekranından kaldırıp soluk bir sesle konuşuyor:{/n} "Leydi Molles-Secundas, bir Administratum yetkilisine rüşvet verdiğini itiraf etmiş, zürriyetinin bağışlanmasını istemiştir."
